definitions.definition: containing or relating to alcoholic liquor.
examples: beer is the favorite alcoholic drink

definitions.definition: caused by the excessive consumption of alcohol.

examples: his alcoholic daughter was the cause of his anxiety

dipsomaniac, drunk, drunkard, heavy/hard/serious drinker, problem drinker, binge drinker, alcohol abuser, person with a drinking problem; Moretippler, sot, inebriate; informalboozer, lush, alky, boozehound, dipso, juicer, wino, barfly "he is an alcoholic"Moretippler, sot, inebriate; boozer, lush, alky, boozehound, dipso, juicer, wino, barfly he is an alcoholic
